dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3920 IH: E–Free Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Fitzpatrick (for himself, Mrs. Blackburn, Mr. Smith of New Jersey, and Mr. Sablan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To direct the Commissioner of Food and Drugs to issue an order withdrawing approval for Essure System.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the E–Free Act.

section.header: Withdrawal of premarket approval for Essure System
section.text: Not later than 60 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the Commissioner of Food and Drugs shall issue an order under section 515(e) of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act (21 U.S.C. 360e(e)) withdrawing approval for Essure System.
